title: Cryptocurrency markets recover after US-China trade dispute
description: Just a few weeks ago, the largest cryptocurrency, Bitcoin, hit its all-time high. Bitcoin surged to over $126,000, but by the end of last week it was $19,000 cheaper – a drop of 15% in less than a fortnight.
